entry.title: WIND WARNING , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:11 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:16 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening then southeast 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 in the morning. High 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Windy. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.summary: Rain. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.summary: Showers. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
